identifier.sql_value: COALESCE(:tbl,:pkg,'')||:objtype||:code|| CASE WHEN :private THEN :userid ELSE '' END

data.content:
$intestazione_sof
Statement of fact
$imbarcazione_tipo $imbarcazione_nome
Port of: $arrival_id_workport Ship's Agent: $intestazione_sof Vessel: $imbarcazione_nome Flag: $imbarcazione_bandiera
coming from: $arrival_id_last_port Destination: $arrival_id_next_port
s:Shippers r:Receivers $ship_rec
Cargo: $cargo_sof
  date / time Times only for Tanker Vessel date / time

$times_eosp_txt $times_aor_txt $times_anchored_txt $times_anchor_up_txt $arrival_times_pob_txt $times_first_rope_txt $times_moored_txt $times_poff_txt $tmes_gangway_txt $times_free_p_txt $nor_tend_txt $nor_rec_txt $nor_acc_txt

$customs_commenced_txt

$customs_completed_txt

$ops_commenced_txt $ops_completed_txt $doc_onboard_txt $times_pobd_txt $times_last_line_txt $times_sailed_txt $times_cosp_txt

$eosp_time $aor_time $anchored_time $anchorup_time $pob_time $firstrope_time $moored_time $poff_time $gangway_time $freep_time $nor_tend_time $nor_rec_time $nor_acc_time $customs_commenced_time $customs_completed_time $ops_commenced_time $ops_completed_time $doc_onboard_time $pobd_time $lastline_time $sailed_time $cosp_time

$sof_tanks_start_insp_txt $sof_tanks_stop_insp_txt $sof_tanks_cargo_calc_txt $sof_tanks_start_ullage_txt $sof_tanks_stop_ullage_txt $sof_tanks_hose_conn_txt $sof_tanks_hose_disconn_txt  
$sof_tanks_average_txt   $sof_tanks_average

$sof_tanks_startinsp_time $sof_tanks_stopinsp_time $sof_tanks_cargocalc_time $sof_tanks_startullage_time $sof_tanks_stopullage_time $sof_tanks_hoseconn_time $sof_tanks_hosedisconn_time


 
$note_txt
$note

compiled._sof_operations: $date $day $operations $from $to

main.formats: {"times_eosp": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_aor": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_anchored": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_anchor_up": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_pob": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_first_rope": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_moored": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_poff": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_gangway": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_free_p": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "nor_tend": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "nor_rec": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "nor_acc": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "ops_commenced": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "ops_completed": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "doc_onboard": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_pobd": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_last_line": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_sailed": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "times_cosp": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_start_insp": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_stop_insp": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_cargo_calc": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_start_ullage": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_stop_ullage": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_hose_conn": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm", "sof_tanks_hose_disconn": "DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm"}::JS

compiled.main:
$intestazione_sof
Statement of fact
$@arrival_id.@vessel_details_id.@imbarcazione_id.@tip_imbarcazione_code.code $@arrival_id.@vessel_details_id.@imbarcazione_id.nome
Port of: $@arrival_id.workport Ship's Agent: $intestazione_sof Vessel: $@arrival_id.@vessel_details_id.@imbarcazione_id.nome Flag: $@arrival_id.@vessel_details_id.@imbarcazione_id.@flag.nome
coming from: $@arrival_id.lastport Destination: $@arrival_id.nextport
s:Shippers r:Receivers $ship_rec
Cargo: $cargo_sof
  date / time Times only for Tanker Vessel date / time

$@arrival_id.@time_arr.eosp_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.aor_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.anchored_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.anchor_up_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.pob_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.first_rope_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.moored_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.poff_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.gangway_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.free_p_txt $nor_tend_txt $nor_rec_txt $nor_acc_txt

$customs_commenced_txt

$customs_completed_txt

$ops_commenced_txt $ops_completed_txt $doc_onboard_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.pobd_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.last_line_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.sailed_txt $@arrival_id.@time_arr.cosp_txt

$@arrival_id.@time_arr.eosp_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.aor_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.anchored_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.anchorup_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.pob_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.firstrope_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.moored_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.poff_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.gangway_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.freep_time $nor_tend_time $nor_rec_time $nor_acc_time $customs_commenced_time $customs_completed_time $ops_commenced_time $ops_completed_time $doc_onboard_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.pobd_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.lastline_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.sailed_time $@arrival_id.@time_arr.cosp_time

$@sof_tanks.start_insp_txt $@sof_tanks.stop_insp_txt $@sof_tanks.cargo_calc_txt $@sof_tanks.start_ullage_txt $@sof_tanks.stop_ullage_txt $@sof_tanks.hose_conn_txt $@sof_tanks.hose_disconn_txt  
$@sof_tanks.average_txt   $@sof_tanks.average

$@sof_tanks.startinsp_time $@sof_tanks.stopinsp_time $@sof_tanks.cargocalc_time $@sof_tanks.startullage_time $@sof_tanks.stopullage_time $@sof_tanks.hoseconn_time $@sof_tanks.hosedisconn_time


 
$note_txt
$note
$@sof_operations
DATE DAY OPERATIONS FROM HRS TO HRS
$sof_shiprec The Agents The Master
